course.title: Up and Running with Symfony2 for PHP
course.author: Jon Peck
course.description: Build PHP applications the modern way with Symfony2, a popular PHP MVC framework.

course.title: Up and Running with Linux for PHP Developers
course.author: Jon Peck
course.description: Need a powerful development environment? Learn how to quickly install and configure a virtual Linux web server on your Mac or Windows computer.

course.title: Creating Secure PHP Websites
course.author: Kevin Skoglund
course.description: Learn how to meet the most important security challenges when developing websites with PHP.
